entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 33 %
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers or drizzle near noon and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
